text: Goutum is a part of Leeuwarden in the municipality Leeuwarden in the province of Friesland, the Netherlands. It had a population of around 2,945 in January 2017.Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2017 - CBS Statline There are two windmills in Goutum, Kramersmolen and Molen Hoogland. ==Notable buildings== * The Protestant church of Goutum * The Kramersmolen * The Molen Hoogland File:Molen Hoogland.jpg|Hoogland mill ==References== ==External links== *http://www.goutum.info Category:Leeuwarden Category:Populated places in Friesland
title: Goutum
